syllabus_leaves.path: CAUSES OF PARTITION OF BENGAL > Bengal was the nerve centre of Indian nationalism at that time.
path_titles: Bengal was the nerve centre of Indian nationalism at that time.
syllabus_leaves.title: Bengal was the nerve centre of Indian nationalism at that time.

syllabus_leaves.path: CAUSES OF PARTITION OF BENGAL > The Partition of the state was intended to curb Bengali influence.
path_titles: The Partition of the state was intended to curb Bengali influence.
syllabus_leaves.title: The Partition of the state was intended to curb Bengali influence.

syllabus_leaves.path: CAUSES OF PARTITION OF BENGAL > The Partition was meant to foster division on the basis of religion.
path_titles: The Partition was meant to foster division on the basis of religion.
syllabus_leaves.title: The Partition was meant to foster division on the basis of religion.

syllabus_leaves.path: THE ANTI-PARTITION MOVEMENT
syllabus_leaves.title: THE ANTI-PARTITION MOVEMENT

syllabus_leaves.path: People's Reaction > The Partition came into effect on October 16, 1905.
path_titles: The Partition came into effect on October 16, 1905.
syllabus_leaves.title: The Partition came into effect on October 16, 1905.

syllabus_leaves.path: People's Reaction > The streets of Kolkata were full of the cries of 'Bande Mataram'
path_titles: The streets of Kolkata were full of the cries of 'Bande Mataram'
syllabus_leaves.title: The streets of Kolkata were full of the cries of 'Bande Mataram'

syllabus_leaves.path: People's Reaction > Rabindranath Tagore composed the patriotic song, ‘Amar Sonar Bangla'
path_titles: Rabindranath Tagore composed the patriotic song, ‘Amar Sonar Bangla'
syllabus_leaves.title: Rabindranath Tagore composed the patriotic song, ‘Amar Sonar Bangla'

syllabus_leaves.path: People's Reaction > The ceremony of Raksha Bandhan was celebrated in a new way.
path_titles: The ceremony of Raksha Bandhan was celebrated in a new way.
syllabus_leaves.title: The ceremony of Raksha Bandhan was celebrated in a new way.

syllabus_leaves.path: Impact of the Anti-Partition Movement > The Partition of Bengal along with the Anti-Partition Movement accelerated the Nationalist Movement
path_titles: The Partition of Bengal along with the Anti-Partition Movement accelerated the Nationalist Movement
syllabus_leaves.title: The Partition of Bengal along with the Anti-Partition Movement accelerated the Nationalist Movement

syllabus_leaves.path: Impact of the Anti-Partition Movement > The ideas of Swadeshi and Boycott, born of the popular feelings in 1905, took shape
path_titles: The ideas of Swadeshi and Boycott, born of the popular feelings in 1905, took shape
syllabus_leaves.title: The ideas of Swadeshi and Boycott, born of the popular feelings in 1905, took shape

syllabus_leaves.path: Impact of the Anti-Partition Movement > The Swadeshi Movement not only played an important role in the growth of nationalism and patriotism among the masses
path_titles: The Swadeshi Movement not only played an important role in the growth of nationalism and patriotism among the masses
syllabus_leaves.title: The Swadeshi Movement not only played an important role in the growth of nationalism and patriotism among the masses

syllabus_leaves.path: Impact of the Anti-Partition Movement > A number of indigenous industries like soap and matchstick factories, textile mills, tanneries, banks, insurance companies and so on started growing
path_titles: A number of indigenous industries like soap and matchstick factories, textile mills, tanneries, banks, insurance companies and so on started growing
syllabus_leaves.title: A number of indigenous industries like soap and matchstick factories, textile mills, tanneries, banks, insurance companies and so on started growing

syllabus_leaves.path: Impact of the Anti-Partition Movement > The Partition of Bengal left a lasting legacy of communal distrust and violence.
path_titles: The Partition of Bengal left a lasting legacy of communal distrust and violence.
syllabus_leaves.title: The Partition of Bengal left a lasting legacy of communal distrust and violence.

syllabus_leaves.path: Impact of the Anti-Partition Movement > The people lost their faith in the fair play and justice of the British.
path_titles: The people lost their faith in the fair play and justice of the British.
syllabus_leaves.title: The people lost their faith in the fair play and justice of the British.

syllabus_leaves.path: Impact of the Anti-Partition Movement > The Anti-Partition agitation backfired the plans of Lord Curzon.
path_titles: The Anti-Partition agitation backfired the plans of Lord Curzon.
syllabus_leaves.title: The Anti-Partition agitation backfired the plans of Lord Curzon.
